title: BTC - BTC Blues Revue - Live and more... (2012) [FLAC]
description:
Texas meets France - a musical project including Neal Black (from Texas) , Nico Wayne Toussaint and Fred Chapellier ( from France), and backed by an All Star Band including Mike Lattrell ( from New York ) as well as Christophe Garreau and Vincent Daune (from France).
